description: Unknowing violation - Covered entity did not know about violation and exercised reasonable diligence
Violation due to reasonable cause not due to willful neglect - Entity had legitimate business reason
Violation due to willful neglect but cured within 30 day notice period - Entity remedies violation
Violation due to willful neglect not cured within 30 days - Entity failed to remediate
Penalties increased based on number of individuals affected by violation
Multiplier applied for pattern or practice of violations demonstrating systematic non-compliance
Serious violations including knowing misuse of PHI, unauthorized disclosure, or criminal intent
Penalties reduced based on cooperation, corrective actions, first violation, cooperation with OCR
Penalties increased for prior violations, failure to cooperate, intentional conduct, impact magnitude

penalty_range: Sum of all violations in calendar year
description: Total civil penalties for all violations assessed in single calendar year subject to annual maximum
